file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 27-63-02-04 - SPOILER CONTROL UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SPOILER CONTROL UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the spoiler control unit of the spoiler system. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 27-63-02-000-801-A SPOILER CONTROL UNIT - REMOVAL SPOILER CONTROL UNIT - INSTALLA- ALL 27-63-02-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 27-63-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 27-63-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SPOILER CONTROL UNIT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the spoiler control unit of the spoiler system. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Passenger cabin, RH side C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin, RH side H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the Circuit Breaker Panel, open the GND SPLR INBD, GND SPLR OUTBD, IND, and SPEED BRAKE circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them. (2) Remove the shroud assembly of the wardrobe. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the four bolts (3) and washers (4). (2) Carefully, pull the spoiler control unit (2) to get access to the electrical connectors (1). (3) Disconnect the three electrical connectors (1). (4) Remove the spoiler control unit (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-63-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Spoiler Control Unit - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONE 232 DET. A 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR (3 POSITIONS) 4. WASHER (4) 3. BOLT (4) 2. SPOILER CONTROL DET. B UNIT 145AMM270256.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 27-63-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 27-63-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. SPOILER CONTROL UNIT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the spoiler control unit of the spoiler system. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 27-63-01-700-801-A/500 SPOILER SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Passenger cabin, RH side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin, RH side I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the spoiler control unit (2) in its installation position, on the support at the fuselage structure. (2) Connect the three electrical connectors (1). (3) Install the four bolts (3) and washers (4) to attach the spoiler control unit (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the Circuit Breaker Panel, close the GND SPLR INBD, GND SPLR OUTBD, IND, and SPEED BRAKE circuit breakers and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them. (2) Do an operational check of the spoiler system ( AMM TASK 27-63-01-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 27-63-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Install the shroud assembly of the wardrobe. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 27-63-02 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
